ipctools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

Description

ipctools ipctools-package
Utilities to Support Integrated Food Security Phase Classification (IPC) Data Analysis and Visualisation

MUAC checks

ipc_muac_check() summarise_muac_check()
Perform MUAC check based on IPC and CDC recommendations

MUAC prevalence

calculate_unweighted_prevalence() calculate_weighted_prevalence() ipc_calculate_prevalence()
Calculate wasting prevalence by MUAC

MUAC classification

classify_age_ratio() classify_sex_ratio() classify_sd() classify_quality() classify_acute_malnutrition()
Classification functions that support the main functions for working with MUAC datasets

Datasets

muac_data
Nutrition survey data with MUAC and oedema measurements and location information anonymised.
